articles.title: WHO calls emergency meeting over monkeypox virus as cases rise: 10 updates | Mint - Mint
articles.description: WHO chief said Europe is the current epicentre of the outbreak, recording more than 80% of monkeypox cases globally.
articles.content: The World Health Organization will soon hold a second meeting of the emergency committee on monkeypox as cases spread to more countries. The UN health agency's director-general Tedros Adhanom Ghebrey… [+2268 chars]

articles.title: European markets look to build on gains as investors digest Fed minutes - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks are expected to open higher on Thursday, building on gains in the previous session.
articles.content:
LONDON European stocks are expected to open higher on Thursday, building on gains in the previous session.
